articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Singaporean Delegation
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Singaporean Delegation
FM Meets New Vietnamese Ambassador
articles.content:
FM Meets New Vietnamese Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Le Van Cu, new Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him, on Oct. 15.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Leaves for Russia 
   Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs led by Vice-Minister Kung Sok Ung left here Monday to visit Russia.
